trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart" /> 控制項的設計階段支援。

trans-unit.source: It extends its parent class, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartDesigner>, by adding a control-specific <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 它會擴充其父類別、 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartDesigner>，藉由新增特定控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>至<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner> does not render the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart> control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner> 不會呈現相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart>設計介面上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The associated control, <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart" />, is a <see langword="sealed" /> class and cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的控制項， <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart" />，是<see langword="sealed" />類別，而且無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, there is little value in deriving from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner" /> because it cannot be overridden to apply to any other control.
trans-unit.target: 因此，很少中沒有值衍生自<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner" />因為它無法覆寫套用到任何其他控制項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the parent method to prevent rendering of the control.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫父方法以避免呈現控制項。

trans-unit.source: Either an empty string ("") or the value of <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml" />.
trans-unit.target: 空字串 (String) ("") 或 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: If there is no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart.WebPartsTemplate%2A> associated with the control, the designer displays the standard gray box with the class name and instance name of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart.WebPartsTemplate%2A>與控制項相關聯，設計師會顯示標準的灰色方塊具有類別名稱和控制項的執行個體名稱。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, no design-time rendering occurs at all because the check boxes and Web Parts titles are rendered by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome> instead of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart> itself.
trans-unit.target: 否則，沒有設計階段呈現就會發生所有的核取方塊和 Web 組件標題所呈現<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome>而不是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart>本身。

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup to represent an empty control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 取得在設計介面上表示空控制項的標記。

trans-unit.source: This operation renders the control as a gray box showing the class name and the instance name.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業會將控制項呈現為灰色方塊顯示類別名稱和執行個體名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart" /> control associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: 與設計工具相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: Binds the designer to the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart" /> control and sets the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewFlags.TemplateEditing" /> view flag to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 將設計工具繫結至相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart" /> 控制項，並將 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewFlags.TemplateEditing" /> 檢視旗標設為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of template groups, each containing one or more template definitions.
trans-unit.target: 取得範本群組集合，各範本群組包含一個或多個範本定義。

trans-unit.source: The appended <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection" /> associated with this class.
trans-unit.target: 與這個類別相關聯之附加的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property overrides its base implementation to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> object that is specific to this class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>屬性會覆寫其基底實作，以新增<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>屬於這個類別的物件。
